text: Pressure Sensor Y250 - Technical Datasheet The Y250 pressure sensor supports measurement ranges up to 250 bar. Temperature limit: up to 180°C continuous operation. Features: stainless steel diaphragm, digital output (RS485), long-term stability ±0.1% FS/year. Applications include oil & gas pipelines, hydraulic systems, and industrial automation.

Installation and Calibration Manual – Sensor X100 Ensure the sensor is mounted using a high-temperature-resistant fitting. Calibration Procedure: Connect the device to a stable 5V power supply. Use reference thermocouple for alignment. Safety Precautions: Do not expose cables to open flame or corrosive environments. Recalibration interval recommended every 12 months.

Comparison Table – Industrial Sensors The following table compares our main sensor models: Model | Max Temp (°C) | Accuracy | Output | Material X100 | 1200 | ±0.5°C | Analog | Inconel 600 Y250 | 180 | ±0.3°C | Digital | Stainless Steel T310 | 800 | ±0.2°C | Analog | Titanium Alloy The X100 model is best suited for extreme heat applications.
